description: This file defines a Flutter widget for the admin menu management screen in the application. It includes UI components such as headers, items, and layout handling for small and large screens.

classes.name: AdminMenuManagementScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the admin menu management UI page, providing structure and layout for menu management features.

classes.name: _Item
classes.description: A stateless widget representing an individual item card within the menu management screen, styled with shadow and icon.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the admin menu management screen, including header and list of items with responsive layout.

methods.name: _Item.build
methods.description: Builds the widget for individual item, styled with an icon, text, and glow effect.
